mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID, A.BOND_INVT_NO AS BONDINVTNO, A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT, A.GDS_SEQNO AS GDSSEQNO, A.PUTREC_SEQNO AS PUTRECSEQNO, A.GDS_MTNO AS GDSMTNO, A.GDECD AS GDECD, A.GDS_NM AS GDSNM, A.GDS_SPCF_MODEL_DESC AS GDSSPCFMODELDESC, A.DCL_UNITCD AS DCLUNITCD, A.LAWF_UNITCD AS LAWFUNITCD, A.SECD_LAWF_UNITCD AS SECDLAWFUNITCD, A.NATCD AS NATCD, A.DCL_UPRC_AMT AS DCLUPRCAMT, A.DCL_TOTAL_AMT AS DCLTOTALAMT, A.USD_STAT_TOTAL_AMT AS USDSTATTOTALAMT, A.DCL_CURRCD AS DCLCURRCD, A.LAWF_QTY AS LAWFQTY, A.SECD_LAWF_QTY AS SECDLAWFQTY, A.WT_SF_VAL AS WTSFVAL, A.FST_SF_VAL AS FSTSFVAL, A.SECD_SF_VAL AS SECDSFVAL, A.DCL_QTY AS DCLQTY, A.GROSS_WT AS GROSSWT, A.NET_WT AS NETWT, A.USE_CD AS USECD, A.LVYRLF_MODECD AS LVYRLFMODECD, A.UCNS_VERNO AS UCNSVERNO, A.ENTRY_GDS_SEQNO AS ENTRYGDSSEQNO, A.APPLY_TB_SEQNO AS APPLYTBSEQNO, A.CLY_MARKCD AS CLYMARKCD, A.VERSION AS VERSION, A.ACTL_PASS_QTY AS ACTLPASSQTY, A.PASSPORT_USED_QTY AS PASSPORTUSEDQTY, A.RMK AS RMK, A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM INV_CUS_DT_SIMPLE A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_UNIT B ON A.DCL_UNITCD=B.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_UNIT D ON A.LAWF_UNITCD=D.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_UNIT H ON A.SECD_LAWF_UNITCD=H.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_CURR E ON A.DCL_CURRCD=E.CURR_CODE LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_COUNTRY F ON A.NATCD=F.COUNTRY_CO LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_CUS_LEVYMODE G ON A.LVYRLF_MODECD=G.DUTY_MODE
1=1
AND SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
ORDER BY A.GDS_SEQNO ASC
